ComicInfo.Summary:
“THE MERGING OF MULTIPLE EARTHS,” Part Two
Mr. Glum’s devious plot to merge the multi-verse unfolds in its demented glory. Savage Dragon joins his son Malcolm Dragon in an effort to save Angel Murphy and the very earth itself! Enter: Darklord. The awe-inspiring, world-shattering, cosmic event reaches it penultimate chapter and concludes in next issue’s giant-sized 25th anniversary special.
ComicInfo.Title: The Merging of Multiple Earths:2 of 3
ComicInfo.Writer: Erik Larsen,Brandon B.,Jon Adams,Brandon B.,Jon Adams,Erik Larsen
